itemDisplayName: Deploy a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with a secondary node type having Ephemeral OS disks.
description: This template takes a minimum set of parameters and deploys a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with 2 node type. One node type contains Ephemeral OS disks VMs.
summary: This template takes a minimum set of parameters and deploys a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with 2 node type. One node type contains Ephemeral OS Disks.
